title: EJ101 Queen Chair Premium Leather/Black
body: This style EJ101 Queen Chair EJ 101 designed by Hans J. Wegner for Erik Jørgensen is a chair with a chromed steel structure and is available in premium leather. Wegner created Queen already in the 1960s, but the chair has never been launched before. Queen stands out with its long majestic back and neck support and its sublime seating comfort.
